summary: A young woman from the future forces a local gunman to help her stop an impending alien invasion which will wipe out the human race.
cast: Takeshi Kaneshiro|Anne Suzuki|Kirin Kiki|Gorô Kishitani|Yukiko Okamoto|Mitsu Murata|Kisuke Iida|Kazuya Shimizu|Chiharu Kawai|Dean Harrington|Xiaoqun Zhao|Masaya Takahashi|Kenji Motomiya|Hôshi Ishida|Misako Nagashima|Shûgo Oshinari|Steve Ryan|Bernard Beardsley|Sean Vertigo|Ahmad Ali|Eric Robinson|Salah Soltane|Ari Andres|Byron Baron|Adeyto|Semenov Ivan|Francisco Gala|Ryan Hill|Nejat Shanino|Kristie Protacio|Buruna|Kanata Hongô|Richard Cansino|Richard Epcar
title: Returner
